content.paragraph1: Stay informed about FASE developments, industry insights, and opportunities for professional growth and collaboration across the European MGA community.
content.paragraph2: Our news platform serves as your primary source for European delegated underwriting industry information, regulatory updates, and organisational announcements.

foundation.title: FASE Foundation
foundation.description: FASE is established to serve the rapidly growing European MGA sector, addressing the need for pan-European representation and collaboration.

advisory_board.title: Advisory Board Formation
advisory_board.description: Distinguished industry leaders join FASE advisory board to guide strategic direction and represent diverse MGA community interests.

platform_launch.title: Membership Platform Launch
platform_launch.description: FASE member portal goes live, providing registration, directory services, and exclusive resources for European MGA professionals.
